77台奇妙電視直播
Forza Inter⚫️🔵⚫️🔵

Former Brazilian Inter full-back Maxwell, spoke exclusively to Gazzetta TV ahead of the derby della Madonnina tomorrow night at the Stadio Giuseppe Meazza in Milano’s San Siro district.

Maxwell began by talking about the atmosphere at the San Siro during the derby stating that: “The San Siro is football. When you enter the pitch, with that atmosphere, you can feel football history. For me it was great to play there, I have wonderful memories. Sometimes we won the derby and sometimes we lost but I still have exceptional memories of the feelings I experienced on the pitch.”

Maxwell, who also represented Ajax, PSG and FC Barcelona during his career, underlined the importance of the Milano derby as well as making it absolutely clear who he supports tomorrow night: “After a derby win the celebrations in the changing room are different, the joy of winning is incredible. I hope that Inter win because I am an Inter fan, I still have friends there.”
Forza Inter

米蘭打吡大戰，國際米蘭憑住伊卡迪喺補時階段入球，鎖定一比零勝局，擊敗AC米蘭。國米隊長伊卡迪接受訪問時表示，球隊一直都好想贏呢場比賽，而目前最重要係維持穩定性。

伊卡迪喺九十二分鐘走位入禁區，接應隊友域仙奴傳中一頂破網。佢喺賽後接受訪問時表示：
「絕殺入波真係好爽，同舊年一樣。我依加連聲都沙埋。當時我見到個波飛緊入嚟，而對手中堅扯住我件衫，但最終我擺脫咗。但其實我地應該更早解決呢場比賽。」

「『要贏打吡』呢句說話，我地講咗成個星期，我地要贏！呢場比賽中，我地製造咗唔少機會，有一球越位入波，亦有中柱彈出。我地配得上今場勝利，而喺最後一刻鎖定，成件事更加正！」

「呢三分令球隊意識到，我地一定要繼續咁打落去。國際賽周之前，我同自己講『國米要贏』，我地要為所有人，包括入場嘅球迷，以及球隊。我地要繼續贏波，增加穩定性，咁未來一定會更加成功。」

「我地嘅目標係維持穩定性，然後到季尾，睇吓能夠達到咩成就。不過我地依加都係要繼續踢好波、爭取佳績。球隊亦知道自己具備潛力，我地係一支強隊，可以同任何人競爭。所以要繼續好似今日咁！」

熱身咗80分鐘嘅「福將」域仙奴談及國米經常以絕殺取勝，「最近，我成日於最後階段為球隊取勝。呢樣野已經逐漸成為習慣。球隊會戰鬥到底，所以好多時我地都能夠入到波，呢樣係非常重要。」

至於上半場，域仙奴被指頭髮掂到個波，令伊卡迪處於越位位置，相關入球被取消，域仙奴則表示，自己真係有掂到個波，但只係贏咗先咁講...

After his six months spent at Inter and the deception of not seeing his buying option used, Rafinha is now at Barcelona where he hasn't a lot of spaces to play. He'll face Spalletti's Inter this Wednesday and has went back on this six months in Serie A spent as a key player in an interview to Mundo Deportivo:

"Wounded by Inter? It's not the right word. I only spent a few months there, even if they were really good and I got back my physical capacities after a long injury. The fans and my teammates have treated me like I was home. It wasn't planned to leave but there were no obligation to stay according to the contract. Did I expect them to use the buying option? I knew the club was happy with me, I thought they would do it but it didn't happen.

The best aspect of my adventure at Inter? I've found confidence again, I think this is the most important thing. I felt like a footballer again and the happiness of doing what I like most. It's been a brutal and incredible experience. I've been surprised by how excellent my teammates were, it was a fantastic group. It's crazy, Inter made me remember how people live football in Brazil. Nostalgia? These are really nice memories to say the truth".

Will Wednesday game be strange? Obviously. It was a big surprise when I saw the draw but also a motivation. I want to meet again with my former teammates and the people that welcomed me so well. I was in a meeting with my friend Xavi, who's also played in Italy. When the notification arrived on his phone he told me: "Look who we'll face". Imagine my face when I read Inter. Spalletti? He's really strong tactically. He pays a lot of attention to the little details. He also has really good players and a team that can play very well.

Icardi? I've met him for the first time at 15, when I got in Barca's academy. We've studied together and the friendship started there. He's helped me a lot in the first days in Milan. He's an incredible footballer".

replies.msg:
祖利奧施薩7：或許只有4次真正的撲救（巴塞隆拿射中門框以內），而且被比基攻入1球，但他的表現無疑是超級的，無需多言。

邁干8：偉大右後衛的又一場超級演出。在後防線上不知疲倦地奔跑，而且在球隊反擊巴塞隆拿時，能有效獲得控球權。

盧斯奧7.5：巴西中堅的發揮可謂越來越好。對伊巴來說，他就是空中的巨人，而且有無數次關鍵的攔截。

森姆爾8：阿根廷中堅的表現不遜於盧斯奧，常常能夠和隊友們一起封鎖美斯和伊巴，數次單挑美斯成功更是值得回味。

辛尼迪7.5：隊長還是那麼積極和拼命，而我們想問的是，在他結束職業生涯前，能夠觸摸到歐聯獎盃嗎？

慕達5：屬於他的一晚是短暫的，而且被罰出後，也無法出現在5月22日的班拿貝。紅牌或許有些嚴厲，但話說回來，在已經身背1張黃牌的情況下，他本就應該注意自己的動作。

捷禾6.5：賽前才被緊急通知上陣的他表現得足夠好，時常成為球隊的第5甚至第6名後衛，力保球隊淘汰對手。

史奈積達6.5：在中場非常努力地工作，能夠控制住球讓本方的防守球員們得到一旦喘息的機會就是大功一件。

伊度奧6.5：在幾乎得不到球的情況下依然兢兢業業，而且在少有的反擊機會時能夠在控球的同時發揮出速度的優勢，給巴塞隆拿的防守造成一些麻煩。

米列圖6.5：作為球隊前場的尖刀，雖然得球的機會不多，但威脅不小，而且是一顆不能放棄的棋子，比賽最後階段才被替換。

Karamoh’s Agent: “He Wants To Return To Inter”

Yann Karamoh’s agent Oscar Damiani has revealed his client’s desire to make a return to Inter upon the expiration of his loan deal with Bordeaux.

“Karamoh is doing well at Bordeaux, he has scored some goals and he is taking advantage of the space they have given him. There was a lot of competition for his signature but he preferred to go back to France. Bordeaux are in the Europa League and is a good place for him to showcase his abilities and in the future he obviously hopes to return to Inter,” Damiani said in an interview with Tutto Mercato Web.

Damiani also spoke on another of his client’s in Andrei Radu, who joined Genoa on loan from Inter and is doing well.

“Handanovic is very strong and Andrei is just as good but he will have to wait for a chance. He must take advantage of his current positive moment and keep demonstrating what he can do in the next matches.”

其實卡拉莫分分鐘好過基達

According to the club’s official financial statement, Inter paid €14 million initially with another €7 million in add-ons to Racing bringing the total value of the transfer to €21 million. The Argentinian club also announced that negotiations are still ongoing regarding how much money should be paid to the player’s first club Liniers.

Argentinian media also report that after agent fees, bonuses to the player and the aforementioned payment to Liniers, Racing stand to earn around €11.5 million for the transfer of Lautaro to Inter. Racing have in return guaranteed a minimum fee of 10% of €14 million when and if Inter sell the player on, meaning that at least €1,4 million must be paid to Racing when and if Inter decide to sell Lautaro. Furthermore, any sum above €14 million, Racing will earn 10% if the difference in the sums.

Inter have set their sights on two players to strengthen the squad for the future, Sampdoria defender Joachim Andersen and Udinese's Rodrigo de Paul.

Andersen, who arrived at Sampdoria in 2017 from FC Twente, has featured in every minute of the first ten matches for Giampaolo. The central defender (born 1996) has received interest from several clubs around Europe, but Inter are looking to beat the competition, already having initiated contacts.

De Paul has already netted five goals this season in Serie A, his best total yet in the league, and has featured for Argentina in their October friendly against Iraq. Inter are monitoring the player, and if he continues his good form the nerazzurri could accelerate their push for the 24-year-old.
